name: Map Editor
description: This Is A Game Where You Can Make A Map And Move A Character In It.  The Character That You Control's Name Is Bob.  You Can Move Bob With The Arrow Keys.  You Can Move The Selector Box With Your Mouse And You Can Place Different Tiles By Pressing A Number On Your Keyboard And Then Left Clicking With Your Mouse, You Can Delete Tiles By Going Over Them And Right Clicking On Them.  It Is Fun.
